root.name: Knockout Party
root.description: Knockout Party is set in an over-the-top TV game show that focuses on several different types of races and obstacle courses. Featuring over 20 courses, which all contain there own themes and character costumes. The game features two different types of gameplay Races Challenges There are seven races total and twenty different challenges. The controls of the game are simple, players alternate between shaking their Wii Remotes and titling them back and forth to navigate the courses. Only the Wii Remote is required to play the game, but the Wii Balance Board may be used as well.
